title: MS Office 2013 SP1 Pro Plus 15.0.4711.1000 (x64) RePack-AppzDam
description:
Microsoft Office 2013 SP1 - the best package of applied programs for working with documents of various types. It is composed of the best facilities for business development , as well as to achieve maximum comfort while studying , doing home finances , and more. Whether it's business or home environment , it does not matter , Office 2013 would have to be installed on any self-respecting person who uses a PC is not just for entertainment. Effective and easy to use simple tools can help home users and small businessmen greatly enhance their productivity in all their activities , ranging from e -mail , scheduling and ending the day informative reports and stunning presentations.

Effective and easy to use simple tools can help home users and small businessmen greatly enhance their productivity in all their activities , ranging from e -mail , scheduling and ending the day informative reports and stunning presentations.

Package :

Microsoft Word 2013
Microsoft Excel 2013
Microsoft PowerPoint 2013
Microsoft Outlook 2013
Microsoft Publisher 2013
Microsoft Access 2013
Microsoft InfoPath 2013
Microsoft OneNote 2013
Microsoft Lins 2013

Microsoft SkyDrive Pro 2013

Features :

New features in Microsoft Office 2013:

Opening Microsoft Office, you will immediately notice the new and fresh design. However, all the old and familiar features have not disappeared and were supplemented by new ones, which help to work more efficiently. New Office applications can also be used on smartphones, tablet PCs and cloud environments, even on computers without a specific set of Office. Now the important files will always be available to you, wherever you are and whatever device or used.

Using Office from any location
Install Office by using an account Microsoft.

Use Office program on another computer.

Save files to SkyDrive for easy access and sharing.

Use your personal way to set up, wherever you are.

Saving files and share them in the cloud. Cloud storage is available at any time when you are connected to the Internet. Now you can easily save Office files on SkyDrive or on the organization's website, where you can work on documents Word, Excel spreadsheets and other Office files and make them available to other users. You can even work on a file simultaneously with colleagues.

Joint Meeting. Join an online meeting using slides and PowerPoint, documents Word, Excel spreadsheets and OneNote notes together.
The meeting participants can view the files, even if they have not installed a set of Office.

More options started. Instead of an empty file, you can select the last file or favorite template. OneNote allows you to enter and open notebooks from the Internet or from your computer.

Easier saving and opening. You no longer need a long view and scroll through the dialog boxes. Your most used folders, you will see immediately. You can also attach the location that it was always available.

Easy file sharing. All parameters file sharing collected in Office programs in one place, which can be opened by selecting the File tab click Sharing.

What's new :

Silent installation of all components / S / ALL

Silent Installation WORD + Excel + PowerPoint / S / WEP

Silent Installation WORD + Excel / S / WE

System requirements :

Computer and processor: 1 gigahertz (GHz) or higher, x86. CPU with SSE2 instruction set
Memory (RAM): 1 gigabyte (GB) RAM (32-bit.); 2 gigabytes (GB) RAM (64-bit)
Hard Drive: 3.0 gigabytes (GB) of free space
Screen: graphics hardware acceleration requires a graphics card with support for DirectX10 and resolution of 1024 x 576
Operating System: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows Server 2008 R2 or Windows Server 2012

Note :

Upon completion of the installation will be prompted to change the browser home page. Do not forget to remove the tick
